org.whiteflagprotocol.java

Class WfMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.whiteflagprotocol.java.core.WfMessageCore
      • org.whiteflagprotocol.java.WfMessage

  • public class WfMessage
extends WfMessageCore
    Whiteflag message class

    This is a class representing a Whiteflag message. It contains all methods to handle a Whiteflag message, e.g. to encode, decode, etc. It also provides a nested static class to create Whiteflag messages.

    Whiteflag version:
    v1-draft.6

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  WfMessage.Creator
      Whiteflag nested static message creator class

        Overrides:
        encode in class WfMessageCore
        Parameters:
